original_text: Some of the Pharisees were walking with them. They said, ‘You should not be doing that on our day of rest. It is against God's Law.’
korean_text: 어떤 바리새인들이 말하되 어찌하여 안식일에 하지 못할 일을 하느냐

sentences.original_text: Some of the Pharisees were walking with them
sentences.korean_translation: 어떤 바리새인들이 그들과 함께 걷고 있었다

sentences.original_text: You should not be doing that
sentences.korean_translation: 너희는 그런 일을 해서는 안 된다
